description: A batteries-included SQL query & schema builder for Postgres, MySQL and SQLite3 and the Browser

name: knex

scripts.mssql:init: docker-compose -f scripts/mssql-docker-compose.yml up --no-start && docker-compose -f scripts/mssql-docker-compose.yml start
scripts.oracledb:test: docker rmi -f --no-prune knex-test-oracledb && docker build -f scripts/oracle-tests-Dockerfile --tag knex-test-oracledb . && docker run --rm -i -t -e KNEX_TEST_TIMEOUT=$KNEX_TEST_TIMEOUT -e NODE_VER=$NODE_VER knex-test-oracledb
scripts.plaintest: mocha --exit -t 10000 -b -R spec test/index.js && npm run tape
scripts.postmssql:init: node scripts/wait-for-mssql-server.js && npm run mssql:logs || (npm run mssql:logs;false)
scripts.stress:init: docker-compose -f scripts/stress-test/docker-compose.yml up --no-start && docker-compose -f scripts/stress-test/docker-compose.yml start
scripts.test: npm run pre_test && nyc mocha --exit --check-leaks --globals __core-js_shared__ -t 10000 -R spec test/index.js && npm run tape && npm run bin_test
